title: Poland Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in Poland decreased to 119.40 percent in 2021 from 121.90 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in Poland averaged 101.13 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 127.90 percent in 2016 and a record low of 51.80 percent in 1995. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
